ShadowdarkAXP.Award.Title: Distribute Award
ShadowdarkAXP.Award.Header: Select the Encounter difficulty or enter a custom value.
ShadowdarkAXP.Award.NotGMError: The /award command is only available to GMs.
ShadowdarkAXP.Award.UnrecognizedWarning: Unable to parse {commands}. The /award command should in the syntax '/award 10 Earned some EXP'.

ShadowdarkAXP.Welcome.Title: Award Enrichers and Command
ShadowdarkAXP.Welcome.WelcomeMessage1: It seems you're using Shadowdark Award Exp for the first time.
ShadowdarkAXP.Welcome.WelcomeMessage2: You can now use the text enricher in Journals and chat message
ShadowdarkAXP.Welcome.WelcomeMessageOutput: will create a clickable elemental like so
ShadowdarkAXP.Welcome.WelcomeMessage3: To open the Award menu you may also use the chat command with optional arguments
